divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were taking a walk and it was really dark outside. it was around10pm. i was looking at the stars and then something caught my eye. at first ithought it looked like comet hale-bopp from a few years ago, cos it seemedreally bright, but then it started moving fast and eratically. i wasquestioning my judgement\depth perception cos i thought it could have been afirefly (it was bright and moved like a fly), but my wife was saying it was toohigh to be a fly, and after some observation it seemed as high as a normalplane. then it was flying like a frisbee on a 45-degree tilt, or like aboomerang. i was not sure of the shape though. it was going way too fast to bea plane. after a while of following it in the sky, it flew towards the west anddisappeared from our view. (i hope this description is not too vague!) btwthere were a couple of reports of ufos over ottawa last week on our morningradio talk show - one was triangular shaped, the other was a big bright light.
trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Ottawa
There were no other sightings in Ottawa on or around September 5th 2002
Summary: Strange fast-moving object over Ottawa, Ontario, C
